mapper.select: select a.order_id, a.order_status, b.user_code, b.user_name, b.phone, a.order_price, a.goods_count, a.version, c.goods_name , c.goods_picture , c.goods_introduction , c.goods_sell_price , a.goods_count , c.goods_code from t_order_management a,t_sys_user b, t_goods_management c where a.user_id =b.user_code and a.goods_id = c.goods_code
mapper.update: update t_order_management set order_status = #{orderState}, version = version+1, gmt_modified = now() where order_id = #{orderCode} and version = #{version}
mapper.select: select a.order_id, a.order_status, b.user_code, b.user_name, b.phone, a.order_price, a.goods_count, a.version, c.goods_name , c.goods_picture , c.goods_introduction , c.goods_sell_price , a.goods_count , c.goods_code, d.store_name, d.address from t_order_management a,t_sys_user b, t_goods_management c,t_store_information d where a.user_id =b.user_code and a.goods_id = c.goods_code and c.store_code = d.store_id and order_id = #{orderCode}
